metadata.title: NESCAFÉ GOLD Iced Latte Salted Caramel Carton

text: NESCAFÉ GOLD Iced Latte Salted Caramel Carton

A moment of indulgence is only a few steps away with the perfect blend of select, high-quality ingredients in NESCAFÉ GOLD Iced Latte Salted Caramel Instant Coffee (7 x 14 g). Prepare the ideal Iced Latte by simply adding cold water. This new recipe made with only the finest coffee beans and delicious milk, easily crafts a frothy, café quality latte in the comfort of your own home – no barista necessary. With 7 single servings in each carton, it's a great way to serve up and share a delightfully smooth, cold coffee in your favourite cup. With only 50 calories per serving, you can feel great about sipping on this delicious treat every day. Best served over ice, for a chilled, decadent, refreshment.
7 sachets for sharing a perfectly frothy and creamy, delightful cup of cold coffee
50 calories per serving. No artificial colours, flavours, or sweeteners
Just add cold water and ice, you don't need anything else to enjoy
Our high-quality ingredients will exceed your expectations for instant coffee
per 1 sachet (14g)Amount% DVCalories50Sugars9g9%Total Carbohydrate11gSaturated Fat0.4g2%Total Fat0.4g1%Protein1gSodium115mg5%Amount% DVCalcium40mg3%Iron0.4mg2%Potassium75mg2%
Sugars (Sugar, Glucose Syrup, Lactose), Milk Ingredients, Instant Coffee, Palm Oil, Salt, Dipotassium Phosphate, Tricalcium Phosphate, Natural Flavour.
